
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
happy_country
```

```{r}
eastern_europe <- filter(happy_country, Region == "EASTERN EUROPE") %>%
  select(-c(Region, Country, Climate))
eastern_europe_cor <- eastern_europe %>%
  cor(eastern_europe)
```
```{r}
western_europe <- filter(happy_country, Region == "WESTERN EUROPE") %>%
  select(-c(Region, Country, Climate))
western_europe_cor <- western_europe %>%
  cor(western_europe)
```
```{r}
latin_america_carib <- filter(happy_country, Region == "LATIN AMER. & CARIB")%>%
  select(-c(Region, Country, Climate))
latin_america_carib_cor <- latin_america_carib %>%
  cor(latin_america_carib)
```

```{r}
happy_country$Region[happy_country$Region == "NORTHERN AFRICA"] <- "AFRICA"
happy_country$Region[happy_country$Region == "SUB-SAHARAN AFRICA"] <- "AFRICA"
africa <- filter(happy_country, Region == "AFRICA")%>%
  select(-c(Region, Country, Climate))
africa_cor <- africa %>%
  cor(africa)
```

```{r}

alymod<- lm(HappinessScore~PercievedCorruptionScore, data=happy_country)
summary(alymod)
ggplot(happy_country, aes(x=PercievedCorruptionScore, y=HappinessScore)) +
  geom_point()+
  labs(x="Percieved Corruption Score", y="Happiness Score") +
  geom_jitter()+
  stat_smooth(method = "lm")
```
